official_title: A joint resolution to require the President to issue a proclamation which designates the week beginning February 2, 1986, as "National Crime Prevention Week".

summary.text: Directs the President to issue a proclamation: (1) designating the week beginning February 2, 1986, as National Crime Prevention Week; and (2) encouraging all people, law enforcement agencies, and private businesses to cooperate in crime prevention.

titles.title: A joint resolution to require the President to issue a proclamation which designates the week beginning February 2, 1986, as "National Crime Prevention Week".
